metadata.title: RZ/V2L: Points to note when using ISP Support Package

sections.content:
Question:
I do not perform AI inference with the RZ/V2L, but I wish to use the ISP feature. 
Is there anything I should note when doing so?
Answer:
Yes. Even if inference execution using the DRP-AI will not be performed, you should download the RZ/V2L DRP-AI Support Package and install the DRP-AI driver. The Simple ISP feature of the RZ/V2L requires the DRP-AI driver because it uses the DRP part of the DRP-AI.
Suitable Products
RZ/V2L
